channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 19th August
item.description:
28 day with road closure due to numerous defects carriageway pothole 1000x800x45mm tarmac patch required number 3 (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet
